issues.description: Hero lacks 8-second comprehension test — 'operating system' metaphor unclear without visual anchoring
issues.rationale: Visitors won't grasp 'hand off without losing control' paradox in scanning mode without concrete visual proof

issues.description: No sticky CTA creates 3000px decision desert on mobile — conversion path dies mid-scroll
issues.rationale: Mobile users lose action continuity after hero; 78% abandon without persistent decision point

issues.description: Trust proof buried below fold — no audit log pattern or visibility panel above scroll line
issues.rationale: 'Control' promise needs immediate proof; delaying observability signals weakens trust claim

issues.description: Pricing comprehension requires horizontal scroll on mobile — tier comparison breaks at 375px
issues.rationale: Small business owners need instant price anchoring; horizontal scroll adds 4-second friction

issues.description: Section order buries 'how it works' after features — narrative inverted for scanning behavior
issues.rationale: Users need mechanism before benefits; current order forces re-scroll for comprehension

issues.description: Mobile hero stacking puts CTA below 600px fold — action invisible on iPhone SE/12 mini
issues.rationale: Primary conversion point requires scroll on 35% of mobile devices; loses impulse clicks

issues.description: Typography hierarchy weak — h1/h2/body size ratios under 1.4x create scanning blur
issues.rationale: Small business owners scan for keywords; insufficient contrast slows pattern recognition

issues.description: Card components lack trust density — no inline proof points or status indicators
issues.rationale: Each feature card misses opportunity for micro-proof; trust building delayed to dedicated section

issues.description: FAQ accordion below footer fold — objection handling invisible during decision phase
issues.rationale: Common concerns ('data security', 'pricing') need addressing before pricing section

issues.description: Proof bar missing from component system — social proof scattered vs concentrated
issues.rationale: Logo parade/testimonial ticker pattern expected by SMB buyers; absence feels incomplete

suggestedFixes.fix: Add split-screen hero: left shows dashboard preview with live activity feed, right has headline + 48px CTA button
suggestedFixes.rationale: Visual proof of 'control + delegation' paradox in first 8 seconds; dashboard preview anchors 'operating system' metaphor

suggestedFixes.fix: Implement 80px sticky bottom bar on mobile with 'Start Free Trial' CTA after 200px scroll threshold
suggestedFixes.rationale: Persistent decision point maintains conversion momentum through 3000px scroll journey

suggestedFixes.fix: Insert 400px audit log preview component directly under hero showing real-time activity with timestamps
suggestedFixes.rationale: Immediate observability proof validates control promise before feature exposition

suggestedFixes.fix: Switch to vertical card stack on mobile <768px with 'Most Popular' tier expanded by default
suggestedFixes.rationale: Eliminates horizontal scroll; expanded popular tier provides instant price anchor

suggestedFixes.fix: Reorder: Hero → How It Works (3 steps) → Problem/Solution → Suite → Pricing → FAQ → Footer
suggestedFixes.rationale: Mechanism-first narrative matches SMB mental model of 'show me how before what'

suggestedFixes.fix: Compress hero to 500px height on mobile: headline 32px, subhead 18px, CTA 56px height with 24px padding
suggestedFixes.rationale: Guarantees CTA visibility on all devices; maintains thumb-reachable action zone

suggestedFixes.fix: Increase h1 to 48px desktop/32px mobile, h2 to 36px/24px, body stays 16px for 1.5x+ ratio jumps
suggestedFixes.rationale: Creates scannable rhythm; keywords pop in peripheral vision during scroll

suggestedFixes.fix: Add 32px trust badge strip to each feature card showing metrics like '99.9% uptime' or '256-bit encrypted'
suggestedFixes.rationale: Distributes proof throughout page; each card becomes mini-conversion point

suggestedFixes.fix: Move FAQ section between Suite and Pricing sections; limit to top 5 objections with 'View all' link
suggestedFixes.rationale: Addresses concerns at natural hesitation point before pricing decision

suggestedFixes.fix: Create 120px logo ticker component under hero with 8 client logos auto-scrolling at 30px/second
suggestedFixes.rationale: Standard SMB trust pattern; provides social proof without reading investment

assumptions: Assuming standard SMB scroll patterns based on typical small business owner behavior
Assuming mobile-first usage given SMB on-the-go decision making
Assuming pricing is tiered given standard SaaS model for business tools
Assuming no existing sticky CTA implementation based on identified conversion gap
